com.jaunt.util

Class IOUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaunt.util.IOUtil

  • public class IOUtil
extends Object
    Utility class for I/O operations.
    Since:
    0.9.0
    Author:
    Tom Cervenka

      reads and deserializes the content of the specified file, returning it as an Object.

      returns the data of the specified InputStream as a String.

      writes the specified text to the specified file, overwriting any content already in the file.
      static void write(File file, String text, String charsetName)
      writes the specified text to the specified file in the charset specified by the charsetName, overwriting any content already in the file.

      serializes and writes the specified object to the specified file.
